```{r setup}
library(testthat)
library(matrixR)
context("Test is_inv.")
```


## Parameters


```{r parameters}
matrix_T <- diag(2)
matrix_F <- matrix(
  data = 1,
  nrow = 2,
  ncol = 2
)
colnames(matrix_T) <- paste0("col", 1:ncol(matrix_T))
rownames(matrix_T) <- paste0("row", 1:nrow(matrix_T))
colnames(matrix_F) <- paste0("col", 1:ncol(matrix_F))
rownames(matrix_F) <- paste0("row", 1:nrow(matrix_F))
knitr::kable(
  x = matrix_T,
  row.names = TRUE,
  caption = "Invertible Matrix"
)
knitr::kable(
  x = matrix_F,
  row.names = TRUE,
  caption = "Non-Invertible Matrix"
)
```


## Results


```{r results}
knitr::kable(
  x = data.frame(
    Item = c(
      "Invertible Matrix",
      "Non-Invertible Matrix"
    ),
    Parameter = c(
      "TRUE",
      "FALSE"
    ),
    Results = c(
      is_inv(matrix_T),
      is_inv(matrix_F)
    )
  ),
  row.names = FALSE
)
```


## testthat


```{r testthat_01, echo=TRUE}
test_that("is_inv is TRUE", {
  expect_true(
    is_inv(matrix_T)
  )
})
```



```{r testthat_02, echo=TRUE}
test_that("is_inv is FALSE", {
  expect_false(
    is_inv(matrix_F)
  )
})
```
